description.value: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.DOc3Pf8wmVxanTIv#basic-spellcasting-feat]{Basic Spellcasting Benefits}. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the Rivethun involutionist archetype, add a common divine spell of the appropriate rank, another appropriate divine spell you learned or discovered, or any other divine spell to which you have access, to your repertoire.
